remarks: Cancellation law for vector subtraction.  ( ~ nnncan2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmf.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmf.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvnnncan2 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M C ) M ( B M C ) ) = ( A M B ) ) $.
